options.name: Snack Crafter
options.description: Add 1 Dice to any Temporary Health bonuses provided by consuming Snacks cooked by you.

options.name: Meal Crafter
options.description: Add 1 Dice to any Health recovery bonuses provided by consuming Meals cooked by you.

options.name: Salvager
options.description: Whenever you fail making a Snack or Meal, you can make one additional attempt before losing all the ingredients.

options.name: Fortifying Food
options.description: Anyone who consumes a Snack or Meal cooked by you gains +1 Resistance and Power equal to your Cooking Modifier the next time they take a Breather. A creature can only benefit from this once per day and it expires after their next Full Rest.

options.name: Efficient Chef
options.description: You create twice the amount of Snacks and Meals with the same amount of ingredients and time.

options.name: Hide with Flavor
options.description: You can combine a Potion with a Meal or Snack. When a Creature consumes the Meal or Snack, they gain the effects of the Potion. If the effect is negative and has a Required Check to avoid, that Check is increased by 2.

options.name: Advanced Cooking
options.description: Gain +1 Cooking and access to Cooking Augmentations

options.name: Reaction : Lucky Pan
options.description: When you are forced to make a Block Check, add a +3 if you have a Cooking Pan in your inventory.

options.name: Critical Cook
options.description: Gain +1 Cooking. When you Overcraft on a Cooking Check, your Cooking Modifier is doubled when it is applied to bonuses on your Meals and Snacks.

options.name: Good Food, Sweet Dreams
options.description: Anyone who consumes a Meal cooked by you gets credit for Favorable Rest no matter the conditions. Additionally, they recover extra Power on their Conduit equal to your Cooking Modifier.

options.name: Perfect Meals
options.description: Gain +1 Cooking. Any Meal or Snack created by you always gives the maximum amount of Temporary Health, Health Recovery and Healing instead of rolling.
